PROJECT DEVELOPMENT

Our development and planning process ensures the success of the project according to plan, from location analysis and approval processes through technical planning of implementation. Our wealth of experience ensure economic efficiency and enables successful completion of solar projects around the country.
Project development, which is essential to creating valuable power plant assets, includes activities prior to construction, such as securing a power purchase agreement, establishing site control, project permitting, and the interconnection agreement. With countrywide networks and experienced project development managers who are quiet familiar with state and regional energy policies and solar project application procedures, Rosol Energy is able to work independently or cooperatively with our partners to identify solar project opportunities and lay the project groundwork. Our development and planning professionals ensure project success according to plan, from location analysis and approval processes through technical planning of implementation.

Advantages that ensure success of your project
  • Highly efficient project management based on extensive practical experience and proven successes
  • Our Expert engineering and management with dedicated teams of specialists for on-site implementation
  • Close cooperation with countrywide project developers
  • Flexible development models, including project planning for unused areas, cooperative development, and the assumption of project responsibility
  • Detailed opinions from industries experts
  • Optimal layouts of grounds, systems, and modules
  • Shade analysis with 3D models/software’s and simulations
  • Cost control and security through strict but fair cooperation agreements
  • MNRE, SECI, CERC, IEC, DIN, and BIS/IS standards compliance incorporated from the planning phase
PROJECT FINANCE & INVESTMENT

To maximize the benefits of solar energy, advanced technology must be matched with optimal financing and incentives. Our strong financial relationships and deep knowledge of local tax incentives enable us to ensure that each customer receives maximum return from solar energy. Given our strong network with worldwide financial institutions, public and private funds, and investors, Rosol Energy Pvt Ltd provides tailor-made financial solutions for customers worldwide to realize their solar investment.
Frequently recommended financial services include debt and equity financing support through Rosol Energy Pvt Ltd’s cooperating commercial and political investment banks, insurance institutions, public and private bond markets, and institutional investors. No matter whether your solar project is just beginning or is ready to be built, Rosol’s tailor-made financial solutions are ready for you.
We invest in and arrange for equity and debt for solar projects in various stages of development. Our rigorous and proven investment process reduces or eliminates risks; and our flexible and diversified solutions ensure that our customers receive the best possible returns from their solar energy projects.
For Residential/Commercial Customers – Easy EMI option from Rosol’s financing partners like investment banks, private or commercial financers.

Advantages Ensuring the Success of Your Project
  • Availability of venture capital for interim financing
  • Flexible financing models for investors and banks
  • Cooperation with reliable international banks
  • Cooperation with strong partners and investors
  • Strong trade balance in combination with the parent company
  • Possibility for bridge financing in all project phases
  • Project size scalability
Project Design & Engineering

Rosol Energy’s expert engineers have designed various kW/MW plants and abide by standard plant engineering to configure PV plants that maximize project value. By applying our experience and expertise to meticulously configure PV plant parameters, we ensure that our PV plants deliver the maximum financial results.
Our expert engineers have designed more than 50+ PV plants. With a commitment to optimize design, we go beyond standard plant engineering to configure PV plants that maximize project value. By applying our experience and expertise to carefully configure PV plant parameters, we ensure that our PV plants deliver maximum financial results. We ensure this through the experience and expertise of our engineers, and through our access to highly efficient and quality in-house products. Besides reliability and durability, projects also feature an exceptional price-performance ratio.
Since projects are different, Rosol Energy Pvt Ltd designs solar projects to maximize electricity yield and minimize levelized cost of electricity (LCOE) by considering all factors, such as local irradiance, weather, soil, wind, topography, layout, technology selection, and system configuration. Having engineered several solar power plants following industry best practices and designed hundreds of solar systems, ET Solar smart energy solutions is able to provide global customers with complete system design and engineering services. Our design and engineering expert team provides sophisticated, professional services from the preliminary project development stage through commissioning. Our team consistently follows design guidelines and standards that ensure maximized system safety, reliability, and economy of investment.

Advantages Ensuring the Success of Your Project
  • Expert engineering and management, specialists, proven and experienced project teams
  • Leading system design with state-of-the-art
  • Compliance with MNRE or industry norms and IEC guidelines
  • Top-quality key components from bankable suppliers
  • Optimization of cabling for direct current losses of less than 1.5%
  • Scheduling dependability in all project steps
  • Convincing performance and success balance
  • High-performance guarantee
  • Highest possible power plant performance capability, reliability, and safety
Project Procurement

Our best-practice procurement teams use centralized approach to leverage buying power and optimize project cost. Our valued supply chain network and specific procurement procedures command strong purchasing power and ensure the timely delivery of high quality modules and balance of system components to construction sites.
Rosol Energy has developed a countrywide centralized procurement platform. The procurement platform smoothly runs and leads all over country’s supply chains. With efficient and effective coordination among affiliated solar project components manufacturers and strategically cooperative suppliers, Rosol Energy Pvt Ltd always ensures timely delivery of solar modules and balance of system components to construction sites. Rosol’s best practiced procurement teams established broad connections with countries and world famous solar suppliers and are professional in both quality control and cost optimization. We have successfully sourced BoS for several solar power plants in total more than 4500 kW around the country.

Advantages Ensuring the Success of Your Project
  • Robust, agile supply chain with a strong network, strong purchasing power, and timely delivery
  • Integrated planning, scheduling, and execution system
  • Significant improvements in cost reduction and installation speed
  • Ideal partner with leadership, experience, and technical expertise
  • Strong centralized supply chain management
  • Selection of the best components and equipment with respect to quality, price-performance ratio, and harmonization
  • Key components of the highest quality from premium bankable suppliers
  • Cost control and security through strict cooperation agreements
  • Leverage buying power and optimize project cost
  • Significant cost-reduction improvements
Project Construction

Rosol Energy has developed world-class construction management capabilities and achieved a high level of construction performance with our experience and direct access to sophisticated technology from within the company. We construct turnkey solar plants around the country.

Top-notch Construction Performance through Experience

Rosol Energy Pvt Ltd continuously makes improvements to construction processes in order to increase installation speed, reduce labor costs and environmental impact, and maximize solar energy output through the entire lifecycle of solar projects.

  • Grounds preparation

  • Compensation measures

  • Highly efficient project and quality management

  • Top-notch construction performance backed by experience
Operations & Maintenance

Operation & Maintenance (O&M) is one of the most critical factors that drive a power plant to realize projected revenues. Our goal is to optimize our customers' power plants to produce the maximum amount of energy, and therefore revenue under their power purchase agreement, throughout its operational life. We have made significant investments in O&M technologies in order to develop and create a scalable and sustainable O&M platform. We well know that optimal operation and professional maintenance are the prerequisites for ensuring that a solar plant becomes a profitable financial investment. Combining our experience in plant optimization and advanced diagnostics with our expert O&M staff, Rosol Energy Pvt Ltd. power plants always ensure the investment functions smoothly and without problems, continuously generates solid earnings and thus comfortably meets or even surpasses the profit expectations

We Look After Your Yield

Rosol Energy well understands that optimal operation and professional upkeep are prerequisites for ensuring that a solar plant becomes a profitable financial investment. We believe that maintaining a plant is more than just “fixing” it. We expend maximum effort into preventing faults and keeping your plant performing at its best. With our operations and technology experience, Rosol Energy O&M services ensure a smooth and functional investment that continuously generates solid earnings and comfortably meets or surpasses profit expectations.

  • Greater System Performance and Higher Yields

    • We formulate and apply preventive and enhancing maintenance concepts leading to sustainability and optimized performance.

  • Lower Costs

    • We customize preventive maintenance concepts. Our high-quality service and efficient administration consistently reduce levelized cost of electricity (LCOE).

  • Flexible Service Portfolio
      Our customers can choose freely from our service portfolio, including
    • Operations & maintenance management
    • Visual inspections
    • Project performance testing
    • Energy monitoring
    • Emergency response
    • Financial and energy reports
    • On-going support and consulting services
    • Preventive maintenance
    • Corrective/reactive maintenance
    • Performance evaluation & optimization
    • Project operation diagnosis
    • Recycling
